title: The Asset Allocator: As Geopolitical Tension Escalates
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Beware of pundits advising portfolio changes on the basis of the U.S. drone attack on an Iranian general. Instead, position a portfolio for growth and resilience at all times. This podcast (5:38) argues that a better approach to trying to predict the unpredictable is to own stocks and keep cash, and buy cheap and sell dear. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
